Detailed Description

1D homogeneous functions

Author:
Peter Vanroose, ESAT/PSI
Date:
Nov. 1998

vgl_homg_operators_1d implements one-dimensional homogeneous functions.

   Modifications
      3-Feb-07 Peter Vanroose - added get_vector()
